0.name: Along the Walls of the Abyss
desc: "   The rocky walls continue to the east, west and down.  To the north, the
depths of the abyss end in a blazing flame covering the cavern floor.  There
appear to be thousands of screaming souls writhing in pain, trying to escape
the eternal fires below.  Demons and creatures fly all around the humid air
to the north, feasting on the lost souls of man.  The heat rising from below
is stifling, it is difficult to catch your breath.  A dark hallway has been
dug into the walls of the abyss to the south.

1.name: Along the Walls of the Abyss
desc: "   The depths of the cavernous abyss are quite amazing.  Demons and creatures
fly around the humid air, feasting on the lost souls of man.  The heat rising
from the bottom of the abyss is stifling.  It is difficult to catch your breath.
The rocky walls continue to the north, west and down.

2.name: Stuck in Mid-Air
desc: "   The air of the abyss is so thick and humid that it feels like it can be
walked on.  Looking out and over the abyss, you can see demons and creatures
flying around, feasting on the lost souls of man.  There appears to be
thousands of screaming souls writhing in pain within the flames burning
along the bottom of the cavern.  The heat rising from below is stifling, it
is difficult to catch your breath.  The rocky walls of the abyss can be
found to the east and south.  The stifling air continues to the north, west
and down.

desc: "   The air of the abyss is so thick and humid that it feels like it can be

up and down.

250.name: Along the Walls of the Abyss
desc: "   The cavernous abyss comes to an end a short ways down.  The flames from
below flare up and lick at your boots.  The lost souls screaming and writhing
in pain within the flames reach up and grab at you.  Looking out and into the
abyss, you can see demons and creatures flying around the humid air, feasting
on the lost souls of man.  The heat is almost unbearable, it is difficult to
catch your breath and continue on.  The rocky walls continue to the north,
east, up and down.

251.name: Along the Walls of the Abyss
desc: "   The rocky walls continue to the north, south, up and down.  The cavernous
abyss comes to an end a short ways down.  The flames from below flare up and
lick at your boots.  The lost souls screaming and writhing in pain within
the flames reach up and try to grab at you.  Demons and creatures fly all
around the humid air to the east, diving into the flames to grab a lost soul
and greedily devouring their essence.  The heat rising up from below is
almost unbearable, it is difficult to catch your breath and continue on.

252.name: Along the Walls of the Abyss
desc: "   The rocky walls continue to the east, west, up and down.  The cavernous
abyss comes to an end a short ways down.  The flames from below flare up and
lick at your boots.  The lost souls screaming and writhing in pain within
the flames reach up and try to grab at you.  Demons and creatures fly all
around the humid air to the north, diving into the flames to grab a lost soul
and greedily devouring their essence.  The heat rising up from below is
almost unbearable, it is difficult to catch your breath and continue on.
A deep cavernous hole has been dug into the rocky walls of the abyss to the
south.

253.name: Stuck in Mid-Air
desc: "   The air of the abyss is so thick and humid that it feels like it can be
walked on.  The cavernous abyss comes to an end a short ways down.  The flames
from below flare up and lick at your boots.  The lost souls screaming and
writhing in pain within the flames reach up and try to grab at you.  Looking
out through the expansive abyss, you can see demons and creatures diving
through the air and plunging into the fires below.  They quickly burst through
the flames with a soul or two in their arms and rising into the air quickly
devour their newly captured victims.  What a world!  The heat rising up from
below is almost unbearable, it is difficult to catch your breath and continue
on.  The walls of the cavern can be found to the west and south.  The stifling
air of the abyss spans out to the north, east, down and up.

lick at your boots.  The lost souls screaming and writhing in pain within
the flames reach up and try to grab at you.  Demons and creatures fly all
around the humid air to the east, diving into the flames to grab a lost soul
and greedily devouring their essence.  The heat rising up from below is
almost unbearable, it is difficult to catch your breath and continue on.

desc: "   The air of the abyss is so thick and humid that it feels like it can be

below is almost unbearable, it is difficult to catch your breath and continue

300.name: Along the Walls of the Abyss
desc: "   The bottom of the abyss is covered in a bright, burning flame of red and
orange.  The heat here is unbearable, your only reaction is to flee further
up the walls.  The flames caress and move over your armor, trying to force
you to the earth.  The lost souls screaming and writhing in pain within the
fire reach out and grab at you, trying to make up for what the flames cannot
accomplish.  Looking up and into the cavern air, an amazing sight stretches
out before you.  The demons and creatures flying through the humid air dive
into the flame to grab a soul or two, only to take them back up into the
air and devour their essence.  What a world!  The rock walls continue to the
south, west and up.  The flaming cavern floor of the abyss spans out to the
southwest.

up the walls.  The flames caress and move over your armor, trying to force
you to the earth.  The lost souls screaming and writhing in pain within the
fire reach out and grab at you, trying to make up for what the flames cannot
accomplish.  Looking up and into the cavern air, an amazing sight stretches
out before you.  The demons and creatures flying through the humid air dive
into the flame to grab a soul or two, only to take them back up into the
air and devour their essence.  What a world!  The rock walls continue to the
north, south and up.  The flaming cavern floor of the abyss spans out to the
east.

orange.  The heat here is unbearable, your only reaction is to flee up into
the air.  The flames caress and move over your armor, trying to force you to
the earth.  The lost souls screaming and writhing in pain within the fire
reach out and grab at you, trying to make up for what the flames cannot
accomplish.  Looking up and into the cavern air, an amazing sight stretches
out before you.  The demons and creatures flying through the hot, humid air
dive into the flames to grab a soul or two, only to take them back up into
the air and devour their essence.  Those poor souls.  The rock walls of the
abyss can be found to the west and south.  The flaming cavern floor of the
abyss spans out to the north, east and up.

desc: "   The bottom of the abyss is covered in a bright, burning flame of red and

you to the earth.  The lost souls screaming and writhing in pain within the

accomplish.  Looking up and into the cavern air, an amazing sight stretches

air and devour their essence.  What a world!  The rock walls continue to the

350.name: A Rocky Hallway
desc: "   The hallways seem to breath with a life of their own.  It could just be
your mind playing tricks on you, but the walls are actually pulsing and
shifting as you walk by them.  It is almost like a giant breathing lung.
The cavernous abyss can be found directly to the west.  The long rocky
hallway continues to the east.

363.name: A Lake of Blood
desc: "   The lake would almost seem serene if it was not for the fact that is
completely full of human blood.  Upon closer examination, decomposing human
bodies can be seen floating just beneath the surface of the lake.  As you
stand in one spot for too long, hands begin to breach the bloody surface
and grab at your boots.  The lake of blood continues to the east and north.
A cavernous hallway can be found directly to the west.

vanity sits against the southern wall.  The vanity has a large oval mirror
sitting over it and is covered in beauty products.  Someone obviously spends
a lot of time trying to make themselves look perfect.

395.name: An Unkempt Room
desc: "   The cavern has been transformed into a disgustingly unkempt room.  No one
has cleaned up in here in ages.  There are smells, both interesting and
disconcerting, rising into the air and disturbing your nostrils.  Every piece
of furniture in the room is covered in some sort of filth.  The only way out
appears to be back into the cavernous hallways to the east.

400.name: A Gigantic Cavern
desc: "   The long and rocky hallways have opened up into a gigantic stalagmite and
stalactite covered cavern.  Water drips down from the ceiling and pools into
little puddles on the cavern floor.  To the southwest, a overflowing pile of
bones cover the entire floor of the cavern.  The only way out appears to be
back into the hallways to the northeast.

401.name: A Gigantic Cavern
desc: "   The gigantic stalagmite and stalactite covered cavern continues to the
north and west.  Water drips down from the ceiling and pools into little
puddles on the cavern floor.  An overflowing pile of bones covers the
entire floor of the cavern to the west.  A dark hallway can be seen in
the distance to the far northeast.

402.name: A Gigantic Cavern
desc: "   The gigantic stalagmite and stalactite covered cavern continues to the

403.name: A Pile of Bones
desc: "   The gigantic stalagmite and stalactite covered cavern continues to the
north and east.  A faint dripping sound can be heard echoing in from the
adjacent caverns.  Upon closer inspection, the pile of bones is also full
of bodies, whole and dismembered.  It is almost as if someone has pounded
the bodied into a million pieces.  Suddenly, the middle of the pile begins
to shake and bones being to roll down the pile onto the cavern floor.  Is
something living under this mound of death?  The only way out appears to
be a dark hallway in the distance to the far northeast.

410.name: An Unkempt Room
desc: "   Wow, the smell emanating from this room throws your body into severe
convulsions.  It is difficult to ascertain exactly where the terrible scent
is coming from, but something had to have died in here.  The cavern has been
transformed into a quaint room that might be in an inn somewhere.  However,
it is obvious the hired staff has not been in to clean in a while.  Piles
of trash and excrement lay all over the floor and furniture.  Some sort of
plant is growing from a pint of liquid sitting on a table near the west wall.
This place is truly a mess.  The only way out appears to be back into the
cavernous hallways to the southwest.

of the stand, just begging to be taken.  Maybe nobody will notice if one

447.name: Knee Deep in Slime
desc: "   Yuck!  You immediately plunge into slime and sink down to your knees.  The
slime looks like a huge pool of putrid banana pudding, smells like it too.
Drops of the yellowish liquid falls down from the ceiling and makes a *Ploop*
sound in the slime pool.  The only way out appears to be back into the
cavernous hallway to the west.  The slime pool looks much deeper to the
southeast.

448.name: Knee Deep in Slime
desc: "   Yuck!  You immediately plunge into slime and sink down to your knees.  The
slime looks like a huge pool of putrid, rotting banana pudding, smells like
it too.  Drops of yellowish liquid falls down from the ceiling and makes a
*ploop* sound in the slime pool.  The only way out appears to be a dark
hallway at the far west corner of the slime.  The slime pool looks much

449.name: Knee Deep in Slime

450.name: A Lake of Slime
desc: "   You immediately plunge into the deepest part of the slime lake.  The lake
is a puke yellow color and has the consistency of thirty day old banana
pudding.  *GASP*!  Something long and large brushes up against your leg as
you doggy paddle back to the section of the slime that you could stand up
in.  What could be in this lake?!  Bubbles start to rise from the depths
of the slime and an ominous moan begins to echo throughout the cavern.

476.name: A Living Room
desc: "   The cavern has transformed itself into the likeness of a living room.  A
fireplace burns logs with a snap and crackle along the north wall.  A long
couch rests against the south wall with a pair of arm chairs on each side.
A couple walk into the room, hand in hand, and stop in front of the fireplace
to gaze in each others eyes lovingly.  They are completely oblivious to a
presence monitoring their activity through the window over the armchair to
the left of the couch.  The couple finally retire to the couch and continue to
cuddle in the warm glow of the fire.  They do not even hear the door on the
east side of the living room open nor see a dark and shadowy figure enter
the room.  The only way out seems to be into the cavernous hallway to the
southeast.

477.name: A Rocky Hallway
desc: "   The hallways seem to move with a life of their own.  It could just be
your mind playing tricks on you, but the walls are actually pulsing, expanding
and contracting as you walk through them.  It is almost like a giant breathing
lung.  The long rocky hallways continue to the northeast and southwest.

478.name: A Simple Office
desc: "   The cavern has transformed itself into a simple and quaint office.  There
are several rows of desks making their way up and down the room.  A large
desk rests at the front of the room, it was clearly meant for some type of
management.  The workers quietly go about their day, processing and reviewing
whatever they happen to be working on.  A man who appears to be their manager
walks up and down the isle making sure everyone is doing their job.  One of
the desks in the back of the room is empty, even though the top of the desk
is completely full of work.  It appears that someone was recently let go.
The front door of the office slams open and a knife wielding madman rushes
in.  What could he have in mind?  The only way out appears to be into the
cavernous hallway to the northeast.

487.name: A Playground
desc: "   The cavern has transformed itself into a playground at the beginning of
sundown.  The falling sun casts an eerie light through the monkey bars,
casting an almost grinning shadowy reflection on the ground.  A couple of
kids are playing on some swings, laughing loudly.  One of the boys jumps
off the swing, holds a blue book bag high and dumps all of its contents
onto the dirt.  The boy still has his red book bag strapped to his back,
so this is obviously someone else's possession.  The kids are having so
much fun that they do not notice a creeping shadow sneaking up behind a
large metal slide, slowly drawing a long knife from a hilt.  The only
way out seems to be into the cavernous hallway to the south.

488.name: A Rocky Hallway
desc: "   The hallways seem to move with a life of their own.  It could just be
your mind playing tricks on you, but the walls are actually pulsing, expanding
and contracting as you walk through them.  It is almost like a giant breathing
lung.  The long rocky hallways continue to the up and northeast.

489.name: The Postal Center
desc: "   The caverns have transformed into a simple postal center.  There is a
large counter covering the entire north side of the room.  There are several
postal employees walking and talking behind the counter, just doing their
job.  Several employees walk in and out of the back room, brining newly
arrived parcels to the counter.  Suddenly, the glass front door to the
south swings open and a gun toting maniac bursts through.  This does not
look good.  The only way out appears to be back down the cavernous hallway.

495.name: A Fighting Arena
desc: "   The cavern floor is covered in dirt and bones.  The signs of combat are
clear from the scuffling footprints all over the ground.  Weapons of every
shape and size stick out from the walls and floors.  Long slash marks
scar the cavern walls with pride.  To the northeast, a white marble
staircase ascends to a large throne.  A shadowed figure looks down upon
you, monitoring the fights very closely.  The arena continues to the east
and north.  The only way out appears to be into the cavernous hallway
to the south.

496.name: A Fighting Arena
desc: "   The cavern floor is covered in dirt and bones.  The signs of combat are

shape and size stick out from the walls and floors.  Long slash marks
scar the cavern walls with pride.  To the east, a white marble staircase
ascends to a large throne.  A shadowed figure looks down upon you, monitoring
the fights very closely.  The arena continues to the east and south.  The
only way out appears to be a dark hallway to the far south.

shape and size stick out from the walls and floors.  Long slash marks
scar the cavern walls with pride.  A white marble staircase climbs the

down upon you, monitoring the fights very closely.  The arena continues

499.name: A Throne Room
desc: "   The throne room looks out over the entire arena.  Fights can be seen in
almost every inch of the arena.  What could all these poor people be fighting
over?  Looking to the north, you can see a huge skeletal throne and the
bones look fairly fresh.  A puddle of blood pools and congeals underneath it.
To the far north of the cave you can see a cage door.  What could be in there?
The only way out appears to be back down the white marble staircase.

exits.info: door, closed, locked, pickproof, autoclose, autolock

500.name: A Steel Cage
desc: "   The cage is clearly not meant for comfort.  There are no blankets or food
to be seen.  The stench of death still lingers in the air from the cage's
previous occupants.  The current occupants are probably in for the same fate.
The back of a skeletal throne can be seen through the steel cage bars to
the south.

The shadows around the cave begin to move as you get closer to the ring.
It is likely the ring was not the only thing waiting for you in this
cavern.

595.name: A Rocky Hallway
desc: "   The hallways seem to move with a life of their own.  It could just be
your mind playing tricks on you, but the walls are actually pulsing, expanding
and contracting as you walk through them.  It is almost like a giant breathing
lung.  The long rocky hallways continue to the up and southeast.

606.name: A Small Cavern
desc: "   The cavern is small in comparison to the long dark hallways.  The rocky
room is beaming with activity.  A group of soldiers are fighting in a pile
towards the back of the cave.  It is hard to see what all the hoopla is over
from here.  Suddenly, a glowing helmet breaks free of the pile and begins to
zoom around the room.  The soldiers start to step over each other and run
after the shiny object.  Can't they just get along?

613.name: A Small Cavern
desc: "   The cavern is small in comparison the long dark hallways.  This is the
scene of a gruesome massacre.  The cavern floor is covered in the blood and
bodies of warriors who have fallen in the heat of battle.  The majority of
their heads have been bashed in by some kind of blunt object.  A speck of
white light catches your attention from the back of the room.  The shimmer
appears to be coming from the wide smile of the winner from this battle.
He does not approach you.  He simply stand in the back of the cave clutching
a brilliant green sledge hammer, smiling at you with his head tilted in a
manic way.  Better not get too close to him!

622.name: A Large Pile of Treasure
desc: "   The cavern is small in comparison to the long dark hallways.  A large
pile of treasure covers every inch of the cavern floor.  There is gold,
weapon, jewelry, goblets, plates, paintings and almost every sort of
treasure that you could imagine.  It is almost impossible to resist
reaching out and grabbing some of it.  A laughter on the brink of
insanity rings out from on top of the mound of gold from a shadowed
figure.  The only discernible feature is the wide smile that slowly
grows across its face, followed by the gleam of a sword being drawn from
a sheath.

expanding and contracting as you walk through them.  It is almost like a
giant breathing lung.  A bright red light and humid temperature rises up
from below.  The long rocky hallway continues up.
